importSettings.title: Import Editor Settings
importSettings.message: Are you sure you want to import the editor settings from a file?
importSettings.detail: This will replace the current editor settings. A backup will be created.

removeProject.title: Remove Project from List
removeProject.message: Are you sure you want to remove the project "{{projectName}}" from the list?
removeProject.detail: This will not delete the project on your device.

removeRelease.title: Remove Release
removeRelease.message: Are you sure you want to delete release "{{version}}"?
removeRelease.detail: This will delete the release from your device. You can install it again later.
removeRelease.errorMessage: An error occurred while removing the release.

preferencesError.title: Error reading preferences
preferencesError.message: Could not parse user preferences. Using default preferences.
